      • setMdbMode

        public static boolean setMdbMode(int mode)
        Parameters:
        mode - 0-host mode，1-slave mode
        Returns:
        true - success，false - fail

      • exchangeFromHostToSlaveMdb

        public static byte[] exchangeFromHostToSlaveMdb(byte addr,
                                byte[] sendBuf,
                                int timeout)
        Exchange from host device to slave device. The interface can only be called when the device is host device
        Parameters:
        addr - the address command of slave device
        sendbuf - sent data
        timeout - time out(s)
        Returns:
        return received data if success，null if failed

      • setMdbSlaveAddress

        public static int setMdbSlaveAddress(int slaveAddr)
        Set slave address
        Parameters:
        slaveAddr - the address command of slave device, 0 ~ 255
        Returns:
        0 - success, other - fail

      • receiveDataFromHost

        public static byte[] receiveDataFromHost()
        Receive data from host device
        Returns:
        received data

      • exchangeFromSlaveToHostMdb

        public static int exchangeFromSlaveToHostMdb(byte[] sendBuf)
        Exchange from slave device to host device. The interface can only be called when the device is slave device
        Parameters:
        sendbuf - The sent data. The last digit is the check digit.
        Returns:
        0 - success, other - fail

      • resetSlaveMdb

        public static boolean resetSlaveMdb(int addr)
        Reset slave device. The interface can only be called when the device is host device
        Parameters:
        addr - reset command for slave device
        Returns:
        true - success，false - fail
